text: Eruca sativa (syn. E. vesicaria subsp. sativa (Miller) Thell., Brassica eruca L.), also known as arugula or rocket, is a plant that can be eaten. It is a leaf vegetable with dark green, spiky, dandelion-like leaves and a strong, spicy, peppery flavor. ==Related pages== * Brassicaceae * Leaf vegetable Category:Brassicaceae Category:Leaf vegetables
title: Eruca sativa
